name: Unreal Cookie Clicker
description:
Hello and welcome to Unreal Cookie Clicker! This is a very original idea invented by me I promise.

 Anyways, I actually challenged me and a friend to see who could make the best Cookie Clicker game in an hour and thirty minutes. Here is his game: https://jak3y53.itch.io/cookie-clicker

Now, this is version five of the game as of now, when the game was first complete all it had were two items, and.. A cookie. But in the span of a day I added one more item and a save system. (More items soon to come.).

This game will be receiving updates pretty often.
